OOC: Obviosuly no problem with bringing in Lio and Big Convoy but I just wanted to tell you that I had used them in an off pre-Earth story arc a while back. Just so you could take those events into account to keep continuity. I had a third great war break out on cybertron between the Maximals and Predacons at the same time that future Earth was being attacked by G2 Decepticons. Lio and Big were a part of the Maximals sent to future Earth to fight the G2 Decepticons. Just so that can be a part of their past experiences.

mattwo7 <Matfour@...> wrote:          Four stasis pods dropped down to earth, when they landed, one of them
scanned a Triceratops, and another scanned a T-Rex. They landed with 2
in close proximity and 1 a little farther away and one in the distance. 
One of the two close together was shot open, and Big Convoy
emerged, noticing the other pod, Big Convoy decided he'd better open
it before any predacons did, even though whoever was in the the pod
would most likely get in his way should they run into any...(OOC: If
you watched BW neo you would know this is due to his "one man army"
attitude), so he opened it, and to his surprise, Lio Convoy was in there, 
"Lio Convoy! What a surprise!" Big convoy said, "Hmm so that makes
two leader-types to crash today" A voice said, emerging from a bush,
it was Chomp, the Triceratops transformer, in his robot mode... "Who
you callin' leader type kid?" Big convoy said arguing his role as a
Convoy... then Lio Convoy said, "Heh, some things never change... by
the way, who are you?" "Beast mode!" Chomp said transforming, "You can
call me Chomp..." The two convoys stared at each other as if Chomp had
said something weird... "What? it's a nice name, it fits me, as seeing
as how I like food and enegeron alot..." He said as he started to eat
the bush he emerged from... the two convoys just laughed... 
Meanwhile a good distance away but not too far away to spy on them,
Terry was spying on them, waiting for the right moment "Laugh while
you can fools! Terry, terrorize! Hmm that has a nice ring to it hehehe..."



                         

       
---------------------------------
